name: Granatum
Relationship: Compare: PELLETIERINE (one of its constituents - an anthelmintic, especially for tapeworm); CINA; KOUSSO.

Head: Vertigo very persistent
Sunken eyes; pupils dilated; weak sight
Feels empty
Abdomen: Pain in stomach and abdomen; worse about umbilicus ; ineffectual urging
Dragging in vaginal region, as if hernia would protrude
Chest: Pain between shoulders; even clothing is oppressive
Skin: Sensation as if pimples would break out
Extremities: Pain around shoulders, as if heavy load had been carried

details: As a vermifuge for the expulsion of tapeworm, and homeopathically for the following symptomatic indications. SALIVATION, with nausea, and vertigo. Spasm of the glottis.
